Package ca.yapper.yapperapp.EntrantFragments

Class ProfileFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
ca.yapper.yapperapp.EntrantFragments.ProfileFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class ProfileFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
This is the fragment which displays the users profile and all the functionality for it

    • encodeGeneratedImageToBase64

      private String encodeGeneratedImageToBase64(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap) throws IOException
      This function compresses a given generated image, in order to be more efficient with storage in the database We use a different image format in order to avoid issues with colors and compression loss.
      Parameters:
      bitmap - a given bitmap for an image
      Returns:
      a compressed generated PNG image
      Throws:
      IOException - for encoding errors
